scripts.compile: npm run clean && "node_modules/.bin/babel" --presets es2015 -d build src/main/**/*.js
scripts.bundle: npm run compile && "node_modules/.bin/shx" mkdir -p dist && "node_modules/.bin/browserify" build/src/main/js-hyperscript.js -x js-spec -s jsHyperscript -o dist/js-hyperscript.js
scripts.xxdocs: node_modules/.bin/shx rm -rf ./dist/docs && "node_modules/.bin/cross-conf-env" typedoc --options typedoc.json src/main/api/ -name "js-hyperscript vnpm_package_version"
scripts.all: npm run compress && npm run test && npm run docs && "node_modules/.bin/shx" echo Finished successfully.
